title: GEN-AI 4001: Applied Generative AI Engineering Syllabus

body.raw:
# GEN-AI 4001: Applied Generative AI Engineering Syllabus

| Slug | Title | Weeks | Deliverable placeholders |
|------|-------|-------|--------------------------|
| orientation | Orientation: What is a Gen-AI Engineer? | 1 | roadmap.md, env-setup.md |
| transformer | Module 1: Implementing Transformers from Scratch | 2-4 | mini-gpt.md, walkthrough.md |
| fine-tune | Module 2: Domain-Specific Fine-Tuning | 5-7 | lora-script.md, eval-notebook.md |
| serving | Module 3: Serving LLMs with FastAPI + VLLM | 8-10 | docker-app.md, load-test.md |
| rag | Module 4: RAG with Vector Databases | 11-13 | rag-pipeline.md, retrieval-tests.md |
| multimodal-guardrails | Module 5: Multimodal Reasoning & Guardrails | 14-16 | clip-fusion.md, policy-filters.md |
| mlops | Module 6: MLOps and Model Governance | 17-19 | kubeflow-dag.md, grafana-dashboard.md |
| capstone | Capstone: Job-Market Simulation | 20-24 | brief.md, portfolio-site.md |
